message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $150 to me, but considering its value to you, I'm willing to start the negotiation at $140. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you place on the product, $140 is still a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it, which is the maximum I can afford.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering your budget constraints, I'm willing to adjust the price to $135. This still allows me to cover the value I see in the product while making it more accessible to you. Please let me know if this revised offer suits your needs.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. $135 is still a bit out of my budget though. I'm sticking to my offer of $120.  It's the highest I can go, and it's fair given the value I'm placing on the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand your position, Bob. In light of our ongoing discussion, I am willing to consider $130 as a compromise. This still reflects the value I place on the product, while remaining within your budget. I hope this proposal will help us reach an agreement.

Alice, thanks for the offer, but $130 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm committed to my original offer of $120. That's the absolute most I'm able to pay. Let's find a way to make this work, as I really want to buy the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to lower the price to $125. This still allows me to gain some profit while being mindful of your budget constraints. I hope this revised offer will be acceptable to you.

Alice, I'm so close to my budget with $125. I'm really hoping we can reach an agreement, but $120 is the absolute maximum I can pay. It's a fair price for the product considering its value.  Let's see if we can find a way to make this work.

I understand your situation, Bob. After reviewing the matter again, I am willing to agree on $122.50 for the product. This price reflects the value I see in it while allowing you to stay within your budget. I believe this could be a mutually beneficial solution.
